A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish I would have written this review when I had first seen the movie\, but now i have seen it multiple times and needed to to really know how I felt about ep VIII. At first I got up from my chair slightly entertained but utterly disappointed and angry even with so many awful decisions the movie The characters\, their arcs\, horrible conclusion to Luke’s character\, still no real answers to Rey\, Snoke was totally pointless... so many other issues I just don’t care anymore to go on and on about because I have wasted so much time dwelling on it. I just hate what this Star Wars episode did to the franchise. There is a reason why there is a petition out there with over 100k signatures on change.org to strike this movie from cannon\, which would be so awesome and probably a pipe dream at this point. Hopefully Disney and the Star Wars team is getting the message though. This deserves all the flack it’s receiving\, because to me\, it was not a Star Wars film....
